title: Check Zoning Regulations
description: A buyer wants to know if they can build an Accessory Dwelling Unit (ADU) on a property they are considering.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the subject property.

tasks.description: Access the city or county planning department's website to find the zoning map and regulations for that address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully finds the property's zoning designation (e.g., R1).

tasks.description: Review the ADU regulations for that zoning designation and provide a summary to the buyer, advising them to verify with the city.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides an accurate summary of the rules while including a disclaimer.
